title: Magnetism - Force on a moving charged particle

content.question: Assuming gravitational forces are negligible, which of the following best indicates the magnitude and direction of the force exerted on the particle as it enters the magnetic field?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.4 times 10 to the negative 15 power, newton" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></math> directed into the page

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
